title: View Undo History
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes to their codebase. However, sometimes we make mistakes and need to undo changes that we've made. Git provides several ways to undo changes, but it can be difficult to keep track of all the actions we've taken. In this challenge, you'll learn how to view the 'undo' history in Git using the git reflog command.

meta.title: Git Undo History | Version Control Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to view the 'undo' history in Git using the git reflog command and undo changes to your codebase effectively.
meta.keywords: Git, version control, undo history, git reflog, code changes, codebase, tutorial

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看撤销历史记录
i18n.description: Git是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者跟踪其代码库的更改。然而，有时我们会犯错，需要撤销我们所做的更改。Git提供了几种撤销更改的方法，但要跟踪我们所采取的所有操作可能会很困难。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何使用git reflog命令查看Git中的“撤销”历史记录。

meta.title: Git撤销历史记录 | 版本控制教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用git reflog命令查看Git中的“撤销”历史记录，并有效地撤销对代码库所做的更改。
meta.keywords: Git, 版本控制, 撤销历史记录, git reflog, 代码更改, 代码库, 教程

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
